item.description:
We are moving Banner Making night to Tuedsay (same place and time) due to rain expected for tonight.

We only completed half of our banners at the first Banner Making Party and we had a great time. We will meet in the Papergraphics Parking lot in Merrimack, NH at 6:00 PM to make 25 additional, 3 foot x 9 foot' "Ron Paul Revolution" and "Goggle Ron Paul" banners. We will have stencils, and Tyvek but we need more spray paint.

The best paint has been the .96 cents per can stuff we found at Wal-Mart. The Matt black seems to be working well, but I'm sure the glossy would be fine as well. Please bring 4 cans of black to every one can of red.

Any paint you contribute will be most appreciated.



RAIN DATE TBD.
item.name: Banner Making Night 2
